name: WisdomfromConfucius
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Confucius once said "among three people walking together, I can always learn from one of them." His teaching, his sagacious words, and his humbleness inspire people all over the world to this day. In this flash briefing, I will translate from its original words in a context that we all can have a take away from it.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
